plot outline: A ruthless contract killer Raghav (Nagarjuna) an orphan, falls for an Ornithologist - Bhavna (Urmila Matondkar). Raghav hides his identity to Bhavana. Bhavana's brother, Inspector Krishna (Salim Ghouse) is assigned to solve a murder case (committed by Raghav). The story ends with Bhavana's shocking discovery of Raghav's true identity. A violent, but touching drama about an unusual Love story.
title: Antham
plot: A ruthless contract killer Raghav (Nagarjuna) an orphan, falls for an Ornithologist - Bhavna (Urmila Matondkar). Raghav hides his identity to Bhavana. Bhavana's brother, Inspector Krishna (Salim Ghouse) is assigned to solve a murder case (committed by Raghav). The story ends with Bhavana's shocking discovery of Raghav's true identity. A violent, but touching drama about an unusual Love story.
synopsis: Antham is a Telugu (south Indian Language) word for THE END.A ruthless contract killer Raghav (Nagarjuna) an orphan, falls for an Ornithologist - Bhavna (Urmila matondkar). Raghav hides his identity to Bhavana.Bhavana's brother (cop) is assigned to solve a murder case (commited by Raghav).The story ends with Bhavana's shocking discovery of Raghav's true identity.A voilent, but touching drama about an unusual Love story.Exellent casting, Superb Screenplay , Melodious music by Late R.D Burman.Powerful performance by Nagarjuna and Danny.A brilliantly casted and directed masterpiece. Varma unleashes his creativity by balancing the emotion and voilence in this nicely crafted masterpeice.5/5.
